thread.title: Trade with Britain after Brexit won't be easier, EU's Tusk says

title: Trade with Britain after Brexit won't be easier, EU's Tusk says
text:
Trade with Britain after Brexit won't be easier, EU's Tusk says Wednesday, March 07, 2018 - 00:38 
European Council President Donald Tusk made clear on Wednesday that trade between the bloc and Britain would only get more difficult after Brexit. Rough cut (no reporter narration).   
European Council President Donald Tusk made clear on Wednesday that trade between the bloc and Britain would only get more difficult after Brexit. Rough cut (no reporter narration).  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/03/07/trade-with-britain-after-brexit-wont-be?videoId=406948485&videoChannel=13423
